main.name: Honorine Ndom Ndzah
main.bio: My name is Honorine Ndom Ndzah and I am a Software Engineer based in Seattle, WA, I am a hard-working, detail-oriented Software Engineer passionate about learning, researching, and writing code and I relish the opportunity to take my programming skills and experience to a company where I can continue to learn and grow as a professional software developer.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me via email, this form, or LinkedIn
